verses.verse: And <S%H1130>Ben-hadad<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H758>Syria<s%> gathered all his host <S%H6908>together:<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H2428><s%> and there were <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> him, and <S%H5483>horses,<s%> and <S%H7393>chariots:<s%> and he went <S%H5927>up<s%> and <S%H6696>besieged<s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H8111>Samaria,<s%> and <S%H3898>warred<s%> against it.

And he <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H256>Ahab<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> into the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H1130>Ben-hadad,<s%>
Thy <S%H3701>silver<s%> and thy <S%H2091>gold<s%> is mine; thy <S%H802>wives<s%> also and thy <S%H1121>children,<s%> even the <S%H2896>goodliest,<s%> are mine.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> My <S%H113>lord,<s%> O <S%H4428>king,<s%> according to thy <S%H1697>saying,<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am thine, and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> I have.

And the <S%H4397>messengers<s%> came <S%H7725>again,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>speaketh<s%> <S%H1130>Ben-hadad,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3588>Although<s%> I have <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thee, <S%H559>saying,<s%> Thou shalt <S%H5414>deliver<s%> me thy <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and thy <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and thy <S%H802>wives,<s%> and thy <S%H1121>children;<s%>

Yet <S%H3588><s%> I will <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thee <S%H4279>tomorrow<s%> <S%H518>about<s%> this <S%H6256>time,<s%> and they shall <S%H2664>search<s%> <S%H853><s%> thine <S%H1004>house,<s%> and the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of thy <S%H5650>servants;<s%> and it shall <S%H1961>be,<s%> that <S%H3605>whatsoever<s%> is <S%H4261>pleasant<s%> in thine <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> they shall <S%H7760>put<s%> it in their <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and take it <S%H3947>away.<s%>

Then the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3045>Mark,<s%> I pray <S%H4994>you,<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H3588>how<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> man <S%H1245>seeketh<s%> <S%H7451>mischief:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> he <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me for my <S%H802>wives,<s%> and for my <S%H1121>children,<s%> and for my <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and for my <S%H2091>gold;<s%> and I <S%H4513>denied<s%> <S%H4480><s%> him <S%H3808>not.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, <S%H8085>Hearken<s%> <S%H408>not<s%> unto him, <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H14>consent.<s%>

Wherefore he <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H4397>messengers<s%> of <S%H1130>Ben-hadad,<s%> <S%H559>Tell<s%> my <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> thou didst <S%H7971>send<s%> for <S%H413>to<s%> thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> at the <S%H7223>first<s%> I will <S%H6213>do:<s%> but <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> I <S%H3201>may<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6213>do.<s%> And the <S%H4397>messengers<s%> <S%H1980>departed,<s%> and <S%H7725>brought<s%> him <S%H1697>word<s%> again.

And <S%H1130>Ben-hadad<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, and <S%H559>said,<s%> The <S%H430>gods<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3541>so<s%> unto me, and <S%H3254>more<s%> <S%H3541>also,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> the <S%H6083>dust<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria<s%> shall <S%H5606>suffice<s%> for <S%H8168>handfuls<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H7272>follow<s%> me.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1696>Tell<s%> him, Let <S%H408>not<s%> him that <S%H2296>girdeth<s%> on his harness boast <S%H1984>himself<s%> as he that putteth it <S%H6605>off.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> when Ben-hadad <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>message,<s%> as <S%H1931>he<s%> was <S%H8354>drinking,<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> and the <S%H4428>kings<s%> in the <S%H5521>pavilions,<s%> that he <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> <S%H7760>Set<s%> yourselves in array. And they <S%H7760>set<s%> themselves in array <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H5892>city.<s%>

And, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> there <S%H5066>came<s%> <S%H259>a<s%> <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H256>Ahab<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> Hast thou <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1995>multitude?<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I will <S%H5414>deliver<s%> it into thine <S%H3027>hand<s%> this <S%H3117>day;<s%> and thou shalt <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And <S%H256>Ahab<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> By <S%H4310>whom?<s%> And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> Even by the young <S%H5288>men<s%> of the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of the <S%H4082>provinces.<s%> Then he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4310>Who<s%> shall <S%H631>order<s%> the <S%H4421>battle?<s%> And he <S%H559>answered,<s%> <S%H859>Thou.<s%>

Then he <S%H6485>numbered<s%> <S%H853><s%> the young <S%H5288>men<s%> of the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of the <S%H4082>provinces,<s%> and they <S%H1961>were<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8147>two:<s%> and <S%H310>after<s%> them he <S%H6485>numbered<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> even <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> being <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H505>thousand.<s%>

And they went <S%H3318>out<s%> at <S%H6672>noon.<s%> But <S%H1130>Ben-hadad<s%> was <S%H8354>drinking<s%> himself <S%H7910>drunk<s%> in the <S%H5521>pavilions,<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> and the <S%H4428>kings,<s%> the <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> that <S%H5826>helped<s%> him.

And the young <S%H5288>men<s%> of the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of the <S%H4082>provinces<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H7223>first;<s%> and <S%H1130>Ben-hadad<s%> sent <S%H7971>out,<s%> and they <S%H5046>told<s%> him, <S%H559>saying,<s%> There are <S%H376>men<s%> come <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H4480>Samaria.<s%> <S%H8111><s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H518>Whether<s%> they be come <S%H3318>out<s%> for <S%H7965>peace,<s%> <S%H8610>take<s%> them <S%H2416>alive;<s%> or <S%H518>whether<s%> they be come <S%H3318>out<s%> for <S%H4421>war,<s%> <S%H8610>take<s%> them <S%H2416>alive.<s%>

So <S%H428>these<s%> young <S%H5288>men<s%> of the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of the <S%H4082>provinces<s%> came <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and the <S%H2428>army<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H310>followed<s%> them.

And they <S%H5221>slew<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> his <S%H376>man:<s%> and the <S%H758>Syrians<s%> <S%H5127>fled;<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7291>pursued<s%> them: and <S%H1130>Ben-hadad<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H758>Syria<s%> <S%H4422>escaped<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> a <S%H5483>horse<s%> with the <S%H6571>horsemen.<s%>

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> went <S%H3318>out,<s%> and <S%H5221>smote<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5483>horses<s%> and <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> and <S%H5221>slew<s%> the <S%H758>Syrians<s%> with a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4347>slaughter.<s%>

And the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H5066>came<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, <S%H1980>Go,<s%> strengthen <S%H2388>thyself,<s%> and <S%H3045>mark,<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H834>what<s%> thou <S%H6213>doest:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> at the <S%H8666>return<s%> of the <S%H8141>year<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H758>Syria<s%> will come <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> thee.

And the <S%H5650>servants<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H758>Syria<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, Their <S%H430>gods<s%> are <S%H430>gods<s%> of the <S%H2022>hills;<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> they were <S%H2388>stronger<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> we; <S%H199>but<s%> let us <S%H3898>fight<s%> <S%H854>against<s%> them in the <S%H4334>plain,<s%> and <S%H518>surely,<s%> we shall be <S%H3808>stronger<s%> <S%H2388><s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> they.

And <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing,<s%> Take the kings <S%H5493>away,<s%> <S%H4428><s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> out of his <S%H4480>place,<s%> <S%H4725><s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H6346>captains<s%> in their rooms: <S%H8478><s%>

And <S%H859>number<s%> <S%H4487><s%> thee an <S%H2428>army,<s%> like the <S%H2428>army<s%> that thou hast <S%H5307>lost,<s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5483>horse<s%> for <S%H5483>horse,<s%> and <S%H7393>chariot<s%> for <S%H7393>chariot:<s%> and we will fight <S%H3898>against<s%> them in the <S%H4334>plain,<s%> and <S%H518>surely<s%> <S%H3808><s%> we shall be <S%H2388>stronger<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> they. And he <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> unto their <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3651>so.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> at the <S%H8666>return<s%> of the <S%H8141>year,<s%> that <S%H1130>Ben-hadad<s%> <S%H6485>numbered<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H758>Syrians,<s%> and went <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H663>Aphek,<s%> to <S%H4421>fight<s%> <S%H5973>against<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were <S%H6485>numbered,<s%> and were all <S%H3557>present,<s%> and <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H7121>against<s%> them: and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2583>pitched<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> them like <S%H8147>two<s%> little <S%H2835>flocks<s%> of <S%H5795>kids;<s%> but the <S%H758>Syrians<s%> <S%H4390>filled<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>country.<s%>

And there <S%H5066>came<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H559>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3282>Because<s%> <S%H834><s%> the <S%H758>Syrians<s%> have <S%H559>said,<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H430>God<s%> of the <S%H2022>hills,<s%> but <S%H1931>he<s%> is <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of the <S%H6010>valleys,<s%> therefore will I <S%H5414>deliver<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1995>multitude<s%> into thine <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and ye shall <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And they <S%H2583>pitched<s%> <S%H428>one<s%> over <S%H5227>against<s%> the <S%H428>other<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%> And so it <S%H1961>was,<s%> that in the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> the <S%H4421>battle<s%> was <S%H7126>joined:<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5221>slew<s%> <S%H853>of<s%> the <S%H758>Syrians<s%> a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H7273>footmen<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

But the <S%H3498>rest<s%> <S%H5127>fled<s%> to <S%H663>Aphek,<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H5892>city;<s%> and there a <S%H2346>wall<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> of the <S%H376>men<s%> that were <S%H3498>left.<s%> And <S%H1130>Ben-hadad<s%> <S%H5127>fled,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H5892>city,<s%> into an inner <S%H2315>chamber.<s%> <S%H2315><s%>

And his <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, <S%H2009>Behold<s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> we have <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> are <S%H2617>merciful<s%> <S%H4428>kings:<s%> let us, I pray <S%H4994>thee,<s%> <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H8242>sackcloth<s%> on our <S%H4975>loins,<s%> and <S%H2256>ropes<s%> upon our <S%H7218>heads,<s%> and go <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> <S%H194>peradventure<s%> he will <S%H2421>save<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H5315>life.<s%>

So they <S%H2296>girded<s%> <S%H8242>sackcloth<s%> on their <S%H4975>loins,<s%> and put <S%H2256>ropes<s%> on their <S%H7218>heads,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> Thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H1130>Ben-hadad<s%> <S%H559>saith,<s%> I pray <S%H4994>thee,<s%> let <S%H5315>me<s%> <S%H2421>live.<s%> And he <S%H559>said,<s%> Is he <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H2416>alive?<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> is my <S%H251>brother.<s%>

Now the <S%H376>men<s%> did diligently <S%H5172>observe<s%> whether any thing would come <S%H4480>from<s%> him, and did <S%H4116>hastily<s%> <S%H2480>catch<s%> it: and they <S%H559>said,<s%> Thy <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H1130>Ben-hadad.<s%> Then he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H935>Go<s%> ye, <S%H3947>bring<s%> him. Then <S%H1130>Ben-hadad<s%> came <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> him; and he caused him to come <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H5921>into<s%> the <S%H4818>chariot.<s%>

And Ben-hadad <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, The <S%H5892>cities,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H854><s%> thy <S%H1>father,<s%> I will <S%H7725>restore;<s%> and thou shalt <S%H7760>make<s%> <S%H2351>streets<s%> for thee in <S%H1834>Damascus,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H7760>made<s%> in <S%H8111>Samaria.<s%> Then said Ahab, <S%H589>I<s%> will send thee <S%H7971>away<s%> with this <S%H1285>covenant.<s%> So he <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with him, and sent him <S%H7971>away.<s%>

And a <S%H259>certain<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> of the <S%H4480>sons<s%> <S%H1121><s%> of the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%> in the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H5221>Smite<s%> me, I pray <S%H4994>thee.<s%> And the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3985>refused<s%> to <S%H5221>smite<s%> him.
